      • isFrequencyInRange

        protected boolean isFrequencyInRange(double freq)
        REMARK: This method will be called n times, where n is the filter length Here we calculate sampleRate-cutoff; is this little calculus a performance issue?
        Specified by:
        isFrequencyInRange in class LinearFilter
        Parameters:
        freq - The frequency we want to check.
        Returns:
        TRUE or FALSE, whether this frequency is in filter range or not.
